text: TravelPerk | Senior Frontend Developer | Barcelona | ONSITE travelperk.com We are looking for a talented Senior Front-end Developer with a passion to develop a performant single-page web application with great user experience. You will work as a part of the team that builds a next-generation application for business travel. This position involves: Building and maintaining reusable, testable UI components. Writing a readable, well-documented code. Working closely with our product team to build new features. Working in an Agile environment. Being able to mentor/coach/train other colleagues as a subject matter expert. What do we offer? Competitive compensation including base salary, bonus and equity in the company. 24 vacation days per year and flexible working hours. This position requires full-time, in-house work in Barcelona, Spain. We can help with relocation from anywhere in the world. English is the official language at the office. No prior knowledge of Spanish is required. The link to apply is http://bit.ly/front-eng-tk
